text: muhî€¼mmad[1] allaah ke rasool hain tatha jo log aapake saath hain, ve kaafiron ke lie kade aur aapas mein dayaalu hain. tum dekhoge unhen, rukoo-sajda karate hue, ve khoj kar rahe honge allaah kee daya tatha prasannata kee. unake lakshan, unake cheharon par sajdon ke chinh honge. ye unakee visheshata, tauraat mein hai tatha unake gun, injeel mein us khetee ke samaan bataaye gaye hain, jisane nikaala apana ankur, phir use bal diya, phir vah kada ho gaya, phir vah (khetee) khadee ho gayee apane tane par. prasann karane lagee kisaanon ko, taaki kaafir unase jalen. vachan de rakha hai allaah ne un logon ko, jo eemaan laaye tatha sadaachaar kiye, unamen se kshama tatha bade pratiphal ka
